value.Name: Zero2
value.Text: The Jian, also known as \N"the bird that shares wings,"

value.Name: Sign
value.Text: Known as "the bird that shares wings"

value.Name: Zero2
value.Text: Unless a male and female pair \Nlean on each other and act as one,

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: He's drained after the last battle.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: I wanna swim in some clear ocean water.
I'm sorry to say there's no ocean there.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: I'm in the mood for a swim.

value.Name: Pilot
value.Text: Please sit down and buckle your seatbelts.

value.Name: Hiro16
value.Text: The Jian is also known as \N"the bird that shares wings."

value.Name: Hiro16
value.Text: The book I read about it a long time ago

value.Name: Hiro16
value.Text: said it can't even fly unless a \Nmale and female support each other.

value.Name: Hiro16
value.Text: it must hide among tree leaves,

value.Name: SignZoomedIn
value.Text: The briefing's over.\NContact me. We need to talk.
and dream of the day it can take \Nflight into the skies above.

value.Name: SignZoomedIn
value.Text: Hey, slacker.\NWhere are you right now?\N\NAnyway, you'd better show up for the recruit\Nwelcoming ceremony tomorrow. Got that?\NToo bad about Naomi, but you've been told\Nyou can stay, so don't act all stubborn
If so, where does a bird that \Nends up never flying go?
I know the answer to that all too well.

value.Name: Zorome666
value.Text: Apparently, the girl has horns and fangs,

value.Name: Zorome666
value.Text: and any parasite that rides with \Nher will have his blood sucked

value.Name: Zorome666
value.Text: and die after the third time, without fail.
Yikes. I don't wanna ride with her.
Someone actually overheard \Nsecurity talking about it!

value.Name: Goro56
value.Text: Did you get a hold of Hiro?
So is he gonna stay here after all?
But he didn't attend today's briefing.
Maybe that means he's gonna \Nturn down the chance?

value.Name: Kokoro556
value.Text: Hiro's going to leave? That's so sad.

value.Name: Ikuno196
value.Text: But if he doesn't, where would that leave \NNaomi? She got caught up in his mess.

value.Name: Mitsuru326
value.Text: I say Hiro's showing real integrity.

value.Name: Mitsuru326
value.Text: It must be hard for him to face \Nus after what happened, too.

value.Name: Mitsuru326
value.Text: Spare a thought for how he feels.
Are you okay with this, Ichigo?

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: Good grief. A transport plane's seats \Nare too hard for an old man like me.

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: Can't we travel some other way?
We don't have many options when it comes \Nto transporting cargo that massive.

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: I haven't seen you in ages, but I \Nsee you're still as stiff as ever.

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: I wish the seats and your personality
He's been asked to speed up \Nthe children's training.
After all, this will be the first trial run \Nfor the unit we're using this time.
May I ask you something, Doctor?
Why run that test case here?
And with such a makeshift team, no less?

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: Although the geezers in APE \Nmight not understand it.
So you do have some sort of idea in mind?
Oh, and please do attend the startup ritual.

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: All that aside, I see that our problem \Nchild has already gone missing.
Damn it! She's running off again.
I never knew there was a place like this.
But the uniform's not like ours.
It was like I'd been put under a spell.
and my first-ever look \Nat a naked female body
left me transfixed, unable \Nto take my eyes off her.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Oh. And here I thought you were dead.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: It's so weird. I heard ocean water was salty.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: But it's the most ocean-like place I know.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Really? But it feels so good.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: You were staring so hard,\NI thought you wanted to swim, too.
so I jumped in to save you, and...
S-Sorry, but could you put your clothes on?

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Oh, I get it! You're a pervert!
Th-This isn't what it looks like!

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: But you jumped in to save me, huh?

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: That uniform... Are you a parasite, too?
I no longer have the ability.
I even dragged my partner down with me.
I don't have a place here anymore.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Huh. So you're just like me.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: If you don't belong here,\Njust build a place where you do.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: If you don't have a partner, \Njust find another.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Wow, your taste makes my heart race.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Would you have preferred a kiss?

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Oh, you guys don't know, huh?

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: I think I've taken a liking to you.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Your ability's probably just still dormant.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: I can awaken it for you.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: And you weren't frightened by my horns.
When she held out that hand,
Why do you keep running off alone?

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: It's not like there's anything else to do \Nuntil tomorrow's welcoming ceremony.
Well, as your partner, \NI'm the one who suffers for it.
Are you a parasite cadet? Your \Nwelcoming ceremony's tomorrow, right?
Um, what did you mean by "partner"?
Let me give you some advice.
She's not the kind of pistil \Nthat just anyone can handle.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Do we parasites even have names?
"So you're the same as me," she said.
Getting mocked for my lack of \Na partner would be one thing.

value.Name: G
value.Text: Mistilteinn's issued a \Nsearch request for you.
But the fact that there was still \Na part of me that hoped for one
made me feel pathetic and ashamed of myself.
that a flightless bird has nowhere to go.

value.Name: Sign
value.Text: That a flightless bird\Nhas nowhere to go
Yeah, they're all here to see us.

value.Name: APEHead
value.Text: My children, you have had the good \Nfortune to be chosen as parasites.
As far back as we can remember,
we children had code numbers assigned to us,

value.Name: APEHead
value.Text: Your great predecessors defended \Nour cities and our people,
and were told that piloting weapons called\NFRANXX in male-female pairs to fight

value.Name: APEHead
value.Text: and they splendidly took flight \Nas our representatives.
was our sole purpose in life.

value.Name: APEHead
value.Text: Turn your life into a blaze of glory and \Nshed every last drop of blood you have.

value.Name: APEHead
value.Text: I pray that you will become a \Nshining ray of hope for humanity.
Children that aren't fit for \Nthat purpose have no value.
That's exactly why I decided \Nto leave this place.
Focus on the ceremony. Papa is watching,\Nand so is everyone else.

value.Name: Hachi8
value.Text: That's all the official instructions for\Nyour return to the orphanage.

value.Name: Hachi8
value.Text: Is there anything else you'd like to know?
Code 016, HQ has given you special \Npermission to remain here.
Are you certain you don't want to stay?

value.Name: Naomi703
value.Text: Did you refuse because of me?
It's not like I'd be of any \Nuse even if I stayed.
From your partner, and from yourself.
You remember how many of our friends\Ndisappeared from the orphanage, right?
There's no telling when we \Ncould end up just like them.
So don't try to play the hero!
Who cares if it's favoritism? You're lucky\Nyou have a chance to stay at all!
I would definitely stay, \Neven if it killed me!
Why did you have to be my partner?
Right to the very end, we could never \Ntell what was going through his head.
I hope they both get back safe and sound.
Their ship probably isn't\Nheaded back to the Garden.
I've never even heard of any \Nparasites coming back home.
I don't think we'll ever \Nsee each other again.
I'm done now, but you still have a chance.
You don't have to factor \Nme into your decisions.
I don't need those things anymore.
You know, I really like \Nthis name you gave me.
Hiro, I hope you find a good partner.

value.Name: G
value.Text: Don't! You can take the next \Nplant and still make it!

value.Name: ViceChief
value.Text: We will hereby begin the startup ritual.

value.Name: ViceChief
value.Text: With this, you kids will finally \Nbecome official parasites.

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: This is bad. The fog is rolling in.

value.Name: G
value.Text: What's the matter? Get in already.

value.Name: G
value.Text: It's a klaxosaur! Ready intercepting fire!

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: A moho-class, huh? It's big, \Nstrong, and has a fine look.
This is no time for casual commentary! \NPrepare to evacuate!
Hurry up and retrieve the parasites!

value.Name: APEChief
value.Text: What an ugly sight. Did she \Ndevour her stamen again?

value.Name: ViceChief
value.Text: It's hard to tell which is \Nthe real monster here.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Forget about him. He's done for.
What are you doing in there?

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: What, you ask? I'm going \Nmonster hunting, of course.
You're going to pilot this robot alone?
This is insanity. Besides, \Nyou're by yourself now.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: That's how it's always been. I'm used to it.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: That thing's going to start \Nmoving again eventually.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: And when it does, everyone \Nhere is gonna die either way.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: I have a job to do.
Right now, I can't help my friends
But as I stared at the girl in front of me,
the words that escaped my lips were,\Nfor some reason...
I'll pilot that robot with you.
I'm not about to let you go alone.
But as I am now, I don't belong anywhere.
That's no different from being dead.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Huh... You really are just like me.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: You and I are very similar.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: It's been a long time since \NI last saw a human cry.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: I like the look in your eyes.\NIt makes my heart race.

value.Name: Z2
value.Text: Let me get a taste of you.

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: When the negative and positive\Nmale and female factors combine,

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: the iron maiden will reveal her true form.

value.Name: Fr
value.Text: Now {\i1}this{\i0} is a FRANXX!\NHow truly beautiful!
the kind of robot we'll pilot.
I don't know why, but the warm touch \Nof her lips made my heart race.
Other than that, I remember nothing about \Nwhat happened in the cockpit back then.
You mean that pistil is the one?
This is Code number 002, a pistil with the\Nspecial forces unit APE directly controls.
She's a girl that carries klaxosaur blood.
But having taken this step \Nof my own free will,
I felt like I might be able to fly again.
